BigCommerce believes we can significantly reduce your payment processing costs while keeping your existing gateway. Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
BigCommerce believes we can significantly reduce your payment processing costs while keeping your existing gateway.
We’ve teamed up with one of our preferred payment partners to offer you up to $800 worth of credit in your BigCommerce account and, for qualifying merchants, reduced processing fees.
All you have to do is submit basic information <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/iPayment-Contact-Page.html]]>, and we’ll follow up with you personally.
We want to make payment processing easier and more affordable for you and your customers. Get more information about this special offer <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/iPayment-Contact-Page.html]]>. Offer expires August 30, 2016.
